"Towards the Future":
"I'm interested in those \"Darkers\".
They smell like something dangerous from
Ragol. My nose is never wrong...
Take me to where they come from.
What, the lady scientist wants to come too?
If she can take care of herself, she can do
as she likes. But if she slows us down, I'm
leaving her behind.
※Clear on Normal or higher accompanied
only by Kireek and Rico"

"Rico's PC
※Given on acceptance
※No presents given for boosting friendship"
